participant_1.background:
I tripped and fell into a hole while hiking and broke my leg.
I treasure my record collection, it's a physical manifestation of my passion for music.
i am married with kids.
i love to cook.
I only speak one language, but I love watching action movies with my family on Netflix.

participant_2.background:
I spent a week in the Amazon Rainforest when I was younger, and it was the most amazing experience of my life.
I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.
I love to read and write because they're both solitary activities that allow me to focus on my own thoughts.
I have a bad back from years of standing on my feet all day.
i m not going to go the extra mile anymore.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm excited to be chatting with you today.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to talk to.
I'm sure we'll have a lot in common. I'm a big fan of music, reading, and writing.
Those are all great interests! I love music too, and I enjoy reading and writing as well.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like?
I listen to a little bit of everything, but I'm especially fond of classic rock and country music.
I love classic rock too! I'm not a big fan of country music, but I can appreciate it.
That's fair enough. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love the Beatles too.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands of all time.
I'm glad we have some musical tastes in common.
Me too! I think it's always nice to find someone who enjoys the same things you do.
I agree. It makes for good conversation.
